title: Computer System Architecture, Third Edition
description:
Computer System Architecture (3rd Edition)
524 pages | Sep 22 2010 |ISBN: 0131755633 | DJVU


Dealing with computer architecture as well as computer organization and design, this fully updated book provides the basic knowledge necessary to understand the hardware operation of digital computers.
